Direct Known Subclasses:
TTIOException, TTThreadedException, TTUsageException, TTXPathException
public abstract class AbsTTException
extends Exception

Exception to hold all relevant failures upcoming from Treetank.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
